steps.title: Remove mucus on your tongue with a tongue scraper.
steps.subtitle: Place the tongue scraper on the back of your tongue, then slowly bring it forward. Wipe off the tongue scraper, then repeat as many times as needed. This can remove mucus from the back of your mouth.
sub-points: You can find a tongue scraper at your local drugstore or online.
